title: Lacrosse jersey font
content:
I'd like the font on my lacrosse team's new shorts to match our old jerseys, but I don't know the name of the font on the jerseys. I've taken a picture, and you should be able to see it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002715/http:/postimg.org/image/j6fhsh8y7/). Please let me know if that picture doesn't work or if there's any other information I could provide. Many help for any assistance you're able to offer.

Thanks,  
Artie
author: Artie Armstrong

comments.content:
Looks like British Inserat Condensed  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/british-inserat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002715/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/british-inserat/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/british-inserat/")  
Don
Thank you, Don. This is really great.

You're welcome Artie. Bend it like Beckham!  
Don
